data.title: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII – SQUARE PORTAL

data.text:
Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII is the direct sequel to Final Fantasy XIII-2, part of the Fabula Nova Crystallis: Final Fantasy series. Intended to end the Final Fantasy XIII trilogy, it features Lightning as the main protagonist. The game takes place five hundred years in the future and will feature “a brand-new story, world, characters, and an enhanced gameplay system”, according to Square Enix.

Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII PC Releasing This December

By on

Indeed, Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII is finally releasing for Windows PC in December. After multiple delays, Square Enix decided to break the silence and let the producer Yoshinori Kitase to make an announcement on the official Twitter account: “It’s time for a status report about Lightning Returns: […]

The Final Fantasy XIII Trilogy May Be Coming To PlayStation 4

By on

In the latest Game Watch interview, the Final Fantasy brand manager Shinji Hashimoto discusses about bringing the Final Fantasy XIII trilogy to PlayStation 4 similar to Final Fantasy VII and Final Fantasy X / X-2 HD Remaster. Hashimoto explains that the collection isn’t being planned yet, but it […]

Project: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII Week

By on

They must not be forgotten… . Next week we will be celebrating the 1st anniversary of Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII. That’s right! On 21st November, it will be exactly one year since the game was first released in Japan. Since we know many of our readers are enthusiastic about […]

Never-Before-Seen Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII Concept Art Appears Online

By on

Never-before-seen Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII concept art appears online as Cydesignation published it on their website. These artworks are by Hideo Minaba who was involved in this project as a concept artist. He started working at Square during the Final Fantasy V era but left the company to create […]

Final Fantasy XIII PC Launch Trailer

By on

FINAL FANTASY XIII for Windows PC is out now and includes a number of new features such as full screen mode, 60 FPS support from launch and, due to many requests from fans, Japanese Voice support with subtitles. The development team wishes fans to enjoy playing the game […]

Final Fantasy XIII Arrives for PC Next Week – Here Are The System Requirements

By on

Final Fantasy XIII arrives for PCs next week and it’s good to know the system requirements to see if your PC can run it. Since the game was originally developed for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, it doesn’t really need the top tier hardware to run smoothly. Final Fantasy XIII is […]

The Final Fantasy XIII Trilogy Is Arriving On PC

By on

On its original console release in 2010, FINAL FANTASY XIII marked the dawning of a new era for the celebrated series, bringing the game to multiple hi-definition consoles simultaneously for the first time in its history. The original game and subsequent adventures in the FINAL FANTASY XIII […]
